name: UIInputView
desc: An object that displays and manages custom input for a view when that view becomes the first responder.

items.name: init(frame: CGRect, inputViewStyle: UIInputView.Style)
items.desc: Initializes and returns an input view using the specified style information.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates an input view from data in an unarchiver.

items.name: var inputViewStyle: UIInputView.Style
items.desc: The style for the content of the view.

items.name: enum UIInputView.Style
items.desc: Constants that indicate the appearance changes for an input view.

items.name: var allowsSelfSizing: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the input view is responsible for its own size.
